sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Christmas in Ukraine has been marked by tragedy after at least 10 people were killed by a Russian strike in the city of Kherson.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Dozens have died and millions are without power on Christmas as a powerful winter storm continues to pummel North America.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In his annual Christmas message, Pope Francis calls for an end to what he calls the senseless war in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: In the Russian-occupied Mariupol in Ukraine's southeast, Moscow-appointed authorities erect a 20-metre Christmas tree.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: But officials say there will be no mass holiday celebrations in this city, heavily destroyed by Russian shelling this year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: In nearby Kherson, at least 10 are dead and 58 injured in a strike on Christmas Eve.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The city was recaptured by Kyiv's forces in November, but Kherson has been regularly bombarded ever since, with a heavy toll on civilians and the power supply to the city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: December 24 also marks 10 months since Russia's full-scale invasion of its neighbor, and Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has called for togetherness during his holiday address.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Fighting still rages on around the eastern Haki region and around Bakhmut where Ukrainian and Russian forces have clashed in a fierce months-long battle dozens of people have died in the u.s. as an extreme winter

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: storm continues to batter parts of the country with a blizzard causing dangerous travel conditions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The storm unleashed its full fury on Buffalo and the state of New York with hurricane-force winds causing whiteout conditions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: More than 300,000 homes and businesses found themselves without power on Christmas Eve.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Thousands of flights have been cancelled during the festive period.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The storm is nearly unprecedented in its scope, stretching from Canada to the Texas border.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: About 60% of the U.S US population faces some sort of winter weather advisory or warning. Franco Frattini, who served twice as Italy's foreign minister, died on Saturday at the age of 65, according to Italian media. Frattini had been ill for some time with cancer.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: He was foreign minister under the governments headed by former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: From 2004 to 2008, he was European Commissioner for Justice, and at the time of his death, he was president of Italy's Council of State, a consultative body that oversees public administration. Pope Francis has used his annual Christmas message to make an

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: impassioned plea for an immediate end to the war in Ukraine. In his traditional Urbi et Orbi address to tens of thousands of people gathered in St.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Peter's Square the Pope expressed his sorrow that the icy winds of war continue to shake humanity.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Let God shed his light on those who have the power to silence the thunder of weapons, he said, and bring an immediate end to this senseless war.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Unfortunately, they prefer to listen to other reasons, pushed by the logic of the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The war in Ukraine has exacerbated famine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Think of those going hungry, especially the children.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Pope called for prayers for the many regions of the world suffering from conflict, including the Middle East, Yemen, Syria and Haiti.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Volunteers in the Polish city of Krakow have served some 50,000 free Christmas dinners to the homeless and needy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Anyone who wants can claim a dinner, and free health care is also on offer, with cardiology, orthopaedic and dentistry appointments available.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The scheme was set up by a Catholic charity 26 years ago and has now spread to cities across the country, like here in Poznan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Refugees from Ukraine, the homeless, the elderly and the lonely were among those who took advantage.
